turns.content:
Jo Peninsulas 2:35 PM
Hi Mark Alan,

Indeed, Watamu is a hidden gem with its beautiful natural landscapes and rich biodiversity. It's a perfect example of the kind of places we want to protect and preserve through our Earth Day 2023 initiatives.

To discuss Earth Day 2023 further and explore how you can be a part of it, you can use the following link to schedule a meeting at a time that works best for you: <https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub>

We're looking forward to discussing the event with you and finding ways to collaborate in making Earth Day 2023 a truly impactful and memorable experience.

Best regards,
Jo

Hi Chijioke J., 

I hope this finds you well.

I wanted to share an interesting article from our Founder, Isaac Cohen, about creating a For-Good-Economy. I particularly found the creative ways to attach a for-good angle to generate more revenue, and at the same time, make the world a better place.

4-minute read - let me know what you think.

Best regards,
Jo 

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/for-good-economy-its-good-business-do-isaac-cohen-?trk=public\_profile\_article\_view

Hey Chijioke J., I hope you're having a lovely time during the holiday season.

We've created a group for equatorial project leaders to share their projects and successes so that we can all do our best to reach the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.

I wanted to send you some information via cjevoh@gmail.com - would you mind?

I'd really value your feedback and support in making this group active and productive.

Maybe you could join the group and help us reverse the negative effects of climate change... here's the info:

https://www.linkedin.com/groups/12747681/

Hi Chijioke J.,

Thank you so much for your kind words and the work anniversary wishes! I appreciate it.

I have sent the information regarding the group for equatorial project leaders to your email ([cjevoh@gmail.com](mailto:cjevoh@gmail.com)). Please take a look and let me know your thoughts. Your feedback and support would be invaluable in making the group more active and productive.

Happy Holidays to you and your family as well, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
Jo
we don't want to send him an email. we want to invite him to the whatsapp community

Jo Peninsulas 3:25 PM
Hi Chijioke J.,

Thank you so much for your kind words and the work anniversary wishes! I appreciate it.

I'm glad you're open to receiving information about the equatorial project leaders group. We've actually set up a WhatsApp community where members can share their projects, successes, and collaborate on reaching the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals. I'd like to invite you to join the group to help us reverse the negative effects of climate change and make a greater impact together.

Here's the link to join the WhatsApp community group: <https://bit.ly/Earth-Day-Community>

Please let me know if you have any questions or need assistance. Looking forward to having you in the group!

Best regards,
Jo
